thread.title: Joseph
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: Looked for a specific ski boot, the size of my foot made it hard to find they had it at Eric's bike shop. Had my boots in just 2 days, 1 day earlier than I was told that I would receive them. I will definitely use Eric's bike shop again. It was also the best price I could find!!
